title: Trump, advocates at odds over what violates free speech
shortDescription: A Trump executive order gives federal officials more power to target protesters who vandalize monuments in protest.

title: Trump removes iconic moon rock from Oval Office, sends it back to NASA
shortDescription: The moon rock signifying NASA's lunar ambitions had adorned Joe Biden's Oval Office throughout his entire presidential administration.

title: 'BACK TO PLASTIC!': Trump to sign order ditching paper straws
shortDescription: President Trump said he will sign an executive order next week ending past efforts from Biden for the federal government to embrace paper straws.

title: FEC chair issues sharply worded statement after Trump's foreign assistance remark
shortDescription: During Trump's first term in office, FEC chair Ellen Weintraub issued a sharply worded statement in response to President Trump's remarks about foreign assistance.

title: Trump administration orders lists of low-performing federal workers
shortDescription: The Trump administration ordered all heads of federal departments and agencies Thursday to provide lists of their lowest-performing employees.

title: Trump's buyout offer for federal workers paused by judge | The Excerpt
shortDescription: Plus: President Trump signs an executive order targeting 'anti-Christian bias.' | The U.S. Treasury temporarily agrees to limit DOGE access.

title: 'Suspected child predator' pardoned by Trump arrested on new charge
shortDescription: Andrew Taake, one of the Jan. 6 rioters pardoned by President Trump, had been wanted on a warrant for the 2016 felony solicitation of a minor charge.

title: Trump moves to fire FEC chair, but she's refusing to leave
shortDescription: President Trump has moved to fire Ellen Weintraub, the Democratic chair of the FEC, but she says her termination is invalid and won't step down.

title: Government workers sue to stop Trump from dismantling USAID
shortDescription: The suit says the administration's actions are costing thousands of jobs, threatening national security interests and causing a humanitarian catastrophe.

title: Senate confirms Russell Vought as OMB director
shortDescription: Russell Vought, a key author of Project 2025, was confirmed by the Senate, 53-47, to lead the Office of Management and Budget.

title: Trump administration disbands task force targeting Russian oligarchs
shortDescription: Attorney General Pam Bondi ended the Biden-era DOJ effort to enforce sanctions and target oligarchs close to the Kremlin.

title: Trump administration sues Chicago over ICE detentions
shortDescription: Illinois Gov. JB Pritzker said the state will meet the federal government in court to dispute the claims.

title: Trump announces plans to honor 250 'American Heroes' in statue garden
shortDescription: President Donald Trump called for a national park of 'historically significant Americans in 2020.' Biden revoked it and now Trump is bringing it back.

title: Post confuses RFK Jr. committee vote with confirmation | Fact check
shortDescription: A key committee advanced President Donald Trump's pick to be the nation's health secretary for consideration by the full Senate.

title: Trump Gaza plan divides his party
shortDescription: The idea prompted international condemnation and some dissent from Republicans in Congress.

title: Trump nominates Neil Jacobs to lead NOAA again
shortDescription: Although Jacobs served in the role from 2018 until the end of the president's first term, he was never confirmed by the full Senate.

title: Trump signs order sanctioning ICC over treatment of Israel
shortDescription: Donald Trump is imposing sanctions on the International Criminal Court over its treatment of Israel, including an arrest warrant for Netanyahu.

title: Trump's buyout offer for federal workers paused hours before looming deadline
shortDescription: Unions representing many of the nation’s 2.3 million federal workers charge that the administration’s “unprecedented offer” violates the law.
